function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of observance of regulatory practices and international healthcare guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and higher consequences","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict adherence to guidelines and regulations, and public health education","Technologies":"IoT networks, wearable devices, mobile apps","People":"Healthcare professionals, general populace","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate integration of technologies for sharing health information","Impact":"Inefficiency in cross disciplinary protocols and policies","Mitigation":"Integration of smart devices and data-sharing technologies, accreditation of health professionals","Technologies":"IoT networks, wearable devices, mobile apps","People":"Healthcare professionals, general populace","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Negative outcomes from technological integration","Impact":"Adverse effects on health outcomes and protocols","Mitigation":"Quality assurance and certification of health technologies, rigorous testing and validation","Technologies":"IoT networks, wearable devices, mobile apps","People":"Healthcare professionals, general populace","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, healthcare organizations"}]}
